sentences.en: An old goat is never the more revere for his beard.
I revere that foremost Dhamma, the destroyer of darkness.
sentences.cn: 我崇敬那样的卓越之法,驱除黑暗之法.

sentences.en: Independence consciousness, anxiety - consciousness, carefulness consciousness and revere consciousness to life.
sentences.cn: 主要表现为缺失意识 、 恐惧意识 、 关怀意识和对生命的敬畏意识.

sentences.en: It is hard to free fools from the chains they revere.
sentences.cn: 将愚人从他们所敬拜的锁链下解放出来是非常困难的.

sentences.en: It'seem that we have to revere the matter to arbitration.
sentences.cn: 看来我们只好将此事提请仲裁解决了.
人们对那将军甚表尊敬.

sentences.en: People wondered why Revere was on the Delaware quarter.
sentences.cn: 人们想知道为什么里维尔在特拉华州的四分之一.

sentences.en: Revere drew himself up a little at that, Lige noticed, but his voice was pleasant.
sentences.cn: 莱奇注意到,里维尔一听这话, 身子就略为绷直一些, 但声音还是挺和气的.

sentences.en: Revere puffed his cheeks and blew, but his eyes were dangerous.
sentences.cn: 里维尔鼓起腮帮子, 呼出一口气.他的眼睛里露出凶光.
学生们十分尊敬那些老教授.

sentences.en: The children would be taught to say their prayers, to revere the cross and the flag.
sentences.cn: 孩子们将学会祈祷, 崇敬十字架和国旗.

sentences.en: The Chinese revered corn as a gift from heaven.
sentences.cn: 中国人将谷物奉为天赐礼物。

sentences.en: Toward morning Revere saw two lights in the tower. The British must be coming by sea!
sentences.cn: 黎明前,里威尔看到了塔里的两个灯光, 英国人从海上来了!

sentences.en: Whether Cuban , Mexican or Puerto Rican , most Latinos revere la familia.
sentences.cn: 不管是古巴人 、 墨西哥人.

sentences.en: Who should not revere you, O King of the nations?

words.tran_cn: 虔诚的；表示尊敬的；可尊敬的

trans.tran_en: to respect and admire someone or something very much
to respect and admire someone or something very much
